QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when encrypted and kms_key_id is not null then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when encrypted and kms_key_id is not null then title || ' encrypted with KMS.'
    else title || ' not encrypted with KMS'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_redshift_cluster;
